thread.title: Kenya: Stop Sugar Wars - MP

title: Kenya: Stop Sugar Wars - MP
text:
Botswana: Fossil Fuels Are Dead, Long Live Fossil Fuels - Options for Economic Diversification By Lameck Baraza 
Nominated MP Johnson Sakaja has urged Cord and Jubilee leaders to stop political bickering and look for a lasting solution to the ailing sugar industry. 
Sakaja said both sides of the political divide have in one way or the other participated in the "untidiness of the sugar industry". He spoke at Bumutiru Primary School in Busia on Saturday. Kenya
